meanings.definition: The state of being extremely dirty and unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The squalidnesses of the alley made me hold my breath.
meanings.sent2: The squalidnesses of the abandoned house was evident from the overgrown yard.
meanings.sent3: Despite its squalidnesses, the old cabin had a certain charm.
meanings.sent4: The squalidnesses of the city streets mirrored the despair in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The squalidnesses of the room were etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being morally repulsive or degraded.
meanings.sent1: The squalidnesses of his actions left a stain on his reputation.
meanings.sent2: The squalidnesses of the crime scene shocked the detectives.
meanings.sent3: The squalidnesses of the situation made us question humanity.
meanings.sent4: The squalidnesses of corruption tainted the once noble organization.
meanings.sent5: The squalidnesses of betrayal lingered in the air.
